channel.name: CBC Vancouver CA
channel.title: Murdoch Mysteries
channel.desc: While the electrocution of a young woman leads Murdoch to a war between rival electricity suppliers, and no less than Nikola Tesla, Crabtree finds himself attracted to a suspect.

channel.name: CBC Vancouver CA
channel.title: Downton Abbey
channel.desc: Violet learns about Mary and Tony from Spratt; Mary tells Violet she plans to wed Tony, but admits to Tom that she has no such intention.
